text:
@narendramodi #Covid19 India try opening.
1Shops with half shutters only
2Encouraging home delivery & telephonic orders
3No crowding
4No public transport, no religious gatherings, no political rallies, no restaurants, no schools.
5Open spares, electricians, mechanics, sanitation, factories.
